con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <doc title="API Portal - Apify / Cake Project" xml:lang="en"/> <resources base="https://dacquoise-ssg80.l7tech.com:8443/{tenantId}/portalAuth"> <resource id="Authenticate" path="authenticate"> <param name="tenantId" required="true" style="template" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="username" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="password" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <method id="authenticate" name="POST"> <doc title="">Authenticate using the given username and password</doc> </method> </resource> <resource id="Token Management" path="authenticate/{token}"> <param name="tenantId" required="true" style="template" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="token" required="true" style="template" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <method id="Validate Token" name="GET"> <doc title="">Validates the given token</doc> </method> <method id="Delete Token" name="DELETE"> <doc title="">Delete the given token</doc> </method> </resource> <resource id="Encrypt Password" path="encryptPassword"> <param name="tenantId" required="true" style="template" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="password" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <method id="encryptPassword" name="POST"> <doc title="">Encrypt a given password with it's salt and hashed value</doc> </method> </resource> <resource id="Generate Password" path="generatePassword"> <param name="tenantId" required="true" style="template" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <method id="generatePassword" name="POST"> <doc title="">Generate a password with it's salt and hashed value</doc> </method> </resource> <resource id="Validate Change Password" path="validatePassword"> <param name="tenantId" required="true" style="template" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="username" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="oldPassword" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="newPassword" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default=""> <doc title="">8 characters long. at least one lowercase, uppercase, number and special character. 7b#R8d#T</doc> </param> <method id="validatePassword" name="POST"> <doc title="">Validate the old password and check if new password conforms to password policy</doc> </method> </resource> <resource id="Send Email" path="sendEmail"> <param name="tenantId" required="true" style="template" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="to" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default=""/> <param name="from" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="admin@layer7tech.com"/> <param name="subject" required="true" style="query" type="xsd:string" default="From portalAuth WADL"/> <method id="authenticate" name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="text/plain; charset=UTF-8"/> </request> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>
